valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 30 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: New high expected Faeroes 1040 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northerly 5 to 7. In east, northerly 6 to gale 8.
Sea state
In west, rough, becoming mainly very rough. in east, rough or very rough.
Weather
Wintry showers.
Visibility
In west, good, occasionally moderate. In east, good, occasionally poor.

Gale warning
Issued:
16:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Dec 2025
Northerly gale force 8 expected later
